lead_paragraph: The Education Department said a staff report found a body that had overseen failing institutions like Corinthian Colleges and ITT had fallen short.

headline.print_headline: Education Department Moves to Close a Watchdog of For-Profit Colleges
headline.main: Government Moves to Close a Watchdog of For-Profit Colleges

snippet: The Education Department said a staff report found a body that had overseen failing institutions like Corinthian Colleges and ITT had fallen short....
abstract: Education Dept announces it will shut down Accrediting Council for Independent Colleges and Schools, citing its poor track record and noncompliance with regulations in 21 areas; organization accredited many questionable and substandard institutions, thereby making them eligible for federal student loan program and leading to repayment crisis for many graduates; council plans to appeal.
